_source.short_desc: Datadog is a service that helps increase uptime and maximize the performance of services through centralized monitoring and alerting.
_source.long_desc: Datadog is a SaaS-based monitoring, security, and analytics platform for cloud-scale infrastructure, applications, logs, and more. The platform assists organizations in improving agility, increasing efficiency and providing end-to-end visibility across dynamic or high-scale infrastructures. By collecting metrics and events from 400+ out of the box services and technologies, Datadog enables Dev, Sec, and Ops teams to ensure application uptime and accelerate go-to-market efforts.
_source.pricing_details: Starts at $15 per host per month. Pay-as-you-go or subscription terms available. Service includes unlimited integrations per monitored host. 14-day free trial included in all plans. All plans include custom metrics and events. Pro plans include 13 months data retention, metric alerts, and email support.
_source.target_audience: Datadog is the monitoring, security and analytics platform for developers, IT operations teams, security engineers and business users in the cloud age.

media.caption: Visualize metrics, traces, logs, and more in one place on real-time, customizable dashboards. Pivot easily between different Datadog Tools such as Log Management to APM or Network Monitoring to troubleshoot and resolve issues faster.

Datadog's Logging without Limits? product enables you to cost-effectively ingest, live tail, and archive everything. Decide which logs are most useful to retain (and for how long); change your mind anytime. Analyze logs alongside other parts of your stack

Create Datadog dashboards easily with intuitive drag-and-drop widgets. Display real-time metrics and events from across your stack by utilizing Datadog's 500+ built-in integrations. Datadog offers out-of-the-box dashboards for each of their integrations.

Datadog?s SaaS-based infrastructure monitoring provides metrics, visualizations, and alerting to ensure engineering teams can maintain and optimize cloud or hybrid environments. Get set up in minutes with Datadog's 500+ integrations and simple deployment.

Datadog APM provides end-to-end distributed tracing from frontend devices to databases- with no sampling. By seamlessly correlating distributed traces with frontend and backend data, Datadog APM allows you to reduce latency and eliminate errors easily.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: ProWorkflow is an industry leading and much loved project, task and workflow management software.
related_products.features: ProWorkflow is an industry-leading comprehensive project management tool for teams of 5 to 5000. 17 years of experience and trusted for over 3 million projects, we understand small details through to big data. Track Gantt chart tasks, Kanban boards, time, documents, communications, quotes and invoices. Our powerful API and customizable features let you easily tailor ProWorkflow. World-class customer support & free on-boarding makes the decision to join easy.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
related_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

related_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
related_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

Connect to any data source and centralize all of your data in one place. Visualize, explore and distribute the data the way you need it. 

From highly customizable dashboards and reports to self-serve data exploration and client management, Klipfolio serves a broad range of analytics needs.

similar_products.short_desc: AnswerRocket uses natural language processing and AI-driven automation to generate in-depth insights and visualizations in seconds.

AnswerRocket leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques to automate the hard work of business analysis, empowering teams to generate business intelligence and advanced analytics in seconds via powerful dashboard insights. Whether you need to ask questions in plain English, create interactive visualizations and dashboards, uncover actionable insights, or automate entire workflows, AnswerRocket has you covered.

similar_products.short_desc: Create better Dashboards with automated data collection from 500+ marketing and advertising platforms. Start your free trial today.
similar_products.features: Power your dashboards with cleaned, mapped data from over 500 marketing and advertising platforms. Funnel collects data from all your channels and sends it anywhere you want, a Dashboard Solution, Data Warehouse, BI Tool. Google Sheets, Data Studio, Tableau, Looker, you name it. Stop wasting time unifying data from multiple platforms and let Funnel do the hard work so you can focus on getting the most out of your numbers and figures. Free trial available.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.

Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: FullStory helps businesses understand, measure, and perfect their digital experience across sites and apps.
similar_products.features: FullStory is a trusted Digital Experience Intelligence (DXI) platform that combines rich product analytics, robust session detail, and collaboration tools to deliver real-time insights that uncover opportunities on web and mobile experiences. FullStory's best-in-class DXI platform helps brands understand their users' digital experiences to eliminate friction and capitalize on what's successful.

Iridium lives and breathes business intelligence and financial analytics for law firms every hour of every day. To learn more about Iridium Technology, please v

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.

_source.short_desc: Cost-effectively collect, process, archive, explore, and monitor all of your logs without limitations with Datadog Log Management.
_source.long_desc: Datadog Log Management unifies logs, metrics, and traces in a single view, giving you rich context for analyzing log data. Whether you're troubleshooting issues, optimizing performance, or investigating security threats, Datadog Logging without Limits? provides a cost-effective, scalable approach to centralized log management, so you can get complete visibility across your stack.
_source.pricing_details: Starts at $15 per host per month. Pay-as-you-go or subscription terms available. Service includes unlimited integrations per monitored host. 14-day free trial included in all plans. All plans include custom metrics and events. Pro plans include 13 months data retention, metric alerts, and email support.
_source.target_audience: Datadog is the monitoring, security and analytics platform for developers, IT operations teams, security engineers and business users in the cloud age.

media.caption: Visualize metrics, traces, logs, and more in one place on real-time, customizable dashboards. Pivot easily between different Datadog Tools such as Log Management to APM or Network Monitoring to troubleshoot and resolve issues faster.

Datadog's Logging without Limits? product enables you to cost-effectively ingest, live tail, and archive everything. Decide which logs are most useful to retain (and for how long); change your mind anytime. Analyze logs alongside other parts of your stack

Scalable log management for every team and every stack: Manage access to your log data with granular controls that can be scoped to fit your organization?s structures and roles. Use fine-grained controls to prioritize high-value logs & stay within budget.
Datadog?s dashboards make it easy to aggregate, explore, and visualize your log analytics and metrics in beautiful graphs that immediately communicate insights to anyone on your team.
Datadog's Log Patterns view can help you quickly see the big picture when you?re flooded with verbose app logs, but it also allows you to swiftly drill down to get more details.

category_features.definition: Collects and aggregates data from various systems within the IT environment

category_features.name: Remediation Management
category_features.definition: Identify and orchestrate execution of actions needed to restore systems to optimal conditions

category_features.name: Server Logs
category_features.definition: Log files automatically created for all activities performed by servers, such as a history of web page requests

category_features.name: Threshold Alerts
category_features.definition: Alerts/notification for when traffic utilization or network performance deviates from pre-defined threshold settings

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Hierarchical View
category_features.definition: Organize test cases into hierarchical test plans

category_features.name: Move & Copy
category_features.definition: Copy and paste test cases in order to use the same tests in different suites and plans

category_features.name: Parameterized Testing
category_features.definition: Allows developers to run the same test over and over again using different values

category_features.name: Requirements-Based Testing
category_features.definition: Derives test data, conditions and cases from requirements, including functional and non-functional tests (e.g. performance, usability)

category_features.name: Security Testing
category_features.definition: Uncovers vulnerabilities of the system and determines whether system data and resources are protected from possible intruders

category_features.name: Supports Parallel Execution
category_features.definition: Run multiple tests at the same time in different environments or part of the code base.

category_features.name: Test Script Reviews
category_features.definition: Ability to create, review and approve test scripts

category_features.name: Unicode Compliance
category_features.definition: Consistent way of encoding multilingual text that enables the exchange of text data internationally

category_features.name: Cost Management
category_features.definition: Manage budgets, track and optimize spending and align capacity to workload demand

category_features.name: Multi-Cloud Management
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to monitor and secure applications and workloads across multiple public clouds

category_features.name: Behavioral Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyse user behavior within a system or network

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Anomaly Detection
category_features.definition: Automatically identify unusual behavior

category_features.name: Automated Discovery
category_features.definition: Automatically identify systems to be monitored

category_features.name: Capacity Planning
category_features.definition: Determine and plan production capacity based on changing demands

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Dependency Tracking
category_features.definition: Identifying and outlining how different tasks affect each other

category_features.name: Historical Trend Analysis
category_features.definition: Review data from past periods to reveal recurring tendencies

category_features.name: Multitenancy
category_features.definition: Operate multiple applications in a shared environment

category_features.name: Performance Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitoring and measurement of relevant metrics to assess the performance of IT resources

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Query Analysis
category_features.definition: View and analyze individual requests received by a database

category_features.name: Resource Optimization
category_features.definition: Reallocate existing resources to better utilize capacity

category_features.name: Troubleshooting
category_features.definition: Take actions to resolve performance issues

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Create a targeted plan, schedule resources, and determine long-term goals for the audit process

category_features.name: Corrective and Preventive Actions (CAPA)
category_features.definition: Investigate and take action at root cause or error in products/processes to prevent recurrence of the same error

category_features.name: Disaster Recovery
category_features.definition: Plan and implement business continuity measures in case of unforeseen events

category_features.name: IT Incident Management
category_features.definition: Manage incidents related to outages or breaches in functionality of IT systems

category_features.name: Incident Reporting
category_features.definition: Report and update incidents that occur on a job or en route to a job site

category_features.name: Investigation Management
category_features.definition: Oversee people and resources to carry out an investigation

category_features.name: OSHA Compliance
category_features.definition: Guidelines set by Occupational Safety and Health Administration regarding record keeping

category_features.name: Safety Incident Management
category_features.definition: Track, report on and implement actions pertaining to physical safety at the workplace

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: Assign color coding and icons

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Device Auto Discovery
category_features.definition: Periodically scan the network for external services and take pre-defined actions upon discovery

category_features.name: Hierarchical Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model in which the network map is organized and visualized as a tree-like structure

category_features.name: Location-Based Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model based on the geographic location of users

category_features.name: Map Exporting
category_features.definition: Export a map or layout to share

category_features.name: On-Demand Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model where users create their own map using data they specify

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self-Updating Maps
category_features.definition: Dynamic maps that update whenever network changes are made

category_features.name: Bandwidth Monitoring
category_features.definition: Measure the actual bandwidth available on a local network (LAN or WiFi)

category_features.name: Baseline Manager
category_features.definition: Define network parameters and threshold settings to monitor network health and take necessary precautions

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: Provide insights on the network's performance and health on a continuous real-time basis

category_features.name: IP Address Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the IP addresses of the incoming traffic

category_features.name: Internet Usage Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the amount of internet bandwidth and speed utilized  each resource in a shared network

category_features.name: Network Analysis
category_features.definition: Run tests on the network to find the root cause of the network issues

category_features.name: Network Resource Management
category_features.definition: Manage efficient and effective use of network resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Service Level Agreement (SLA) Management
category_features.definition: Track current service level agreements based on quantifiable metrics

category_features.name: Uptime Reporting
category_features.definition: Track the time for which a designated network or a website is available to the users over a given period of time

category_features.name: Web Traffic Reporting
category_features.definition: Keep track of the amount of data sent and received  the visitors to a website

category_features.name: Alerts / Escalation
category_features.definition: System notifications about the need to bump priority level of ticket

category_features.name: Behavioral Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyse user behavior within a system or network

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track and report regulatory data to either internal management or external stakeholders

category_features.name: Real Time Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track system's health and performance continuously with information and updates being available instantly at any point in time

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

related_products.short_desc: Cloud software that connects people, systems & data into a single view for visibility and actionable intelligence across operations.
related_products.features: PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD) is a leader in digital operations management. In an always-on world, organizations of all sizes trust PagerDuty to help them deliver a perfect digital experience to their customers, every time. Teams use PagerDuty to identify issues and opportunities in real time and bring together the right people to fix problems faster and prevent them in the future.

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
related_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

related_products.short_desc: Keep tabs on user activity and configurations in your on-premises and cloud-based IT systems.
related_products.features:
Netwrix Auditor is a visibility platform that enables control over changes and access in hybrid IT environments and eliminates the stress of your next compliance audit.
It automatically collects, consolidates and archives event and syslog data so you can audit generic events, service events, user logons, account lockouts, remote desktop sessions, and more.
See who's changing what and what's causing downtime and troubleshoot issues faster by drilling down on data for root cause analysis.

related_products.short_desc: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services.
related_products.features: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services. We empower Dev and Ops teams to plan for service disruptions and stay in control during incidents. Opsgenie centralizes alerts, notifies the right people reliably, and enables them to take rapid action. Our deep integrations with 200+ ITSM tools enable you to break down silos between Dev and IT Teams, correlate incidents to code deployments, and easily measure the full impact of a major incident.

related_products.short_desc: Monitor and analyze your employees company-wide whether they are in the office or working remotely.
related_products.features: Veriato Cerebral Employee Monitoring software provides unmatched visibility into the online and communications activity of your employees and contractors.  Cerebral (previously Veriato 360)  is the system of record, presenting detailed, accurate, and actionable data for use in incident response, high-risk insider monitoring, and productivity reporting. Cerebral can be deployed On-prem, in the Cloud or through an MSP provider.

related_products.short_desc: Our APM tools help our 1300+ customers spend less time fighting technology and more time releasing it.
related_products.features: We built a set of APM tools to tell us how, and why, applications fail. From pre-production to deployment, when our 1300+ customers spend less time fighting technology they spend more time releasing it, and those new applications make the world a better place for all of us.

related_products.short_desc: Collect, view and centralize all your logs in a single point.
related_products.features: Collect, view and centralize all your logs in a single point. There are very powerful tools to collect and analyze logs, although installing agents or configuring the forwarding of such logs are tedious tasks. Pandora FMS can handle up to terabytes of raw data. The last thing you would want is to fail an audit, have to disclose a possible data breach because you failed to collect the necessary data for an investigation or not having the data you need to figure out what happened.

related_products.short_desc: Reliably and securely take data from any source, in any format, then search, analyze, and visualize it in real time.
related_products.features:
Built on a foundation of free and open, Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana, and Beats pave the way for diverse use cases that start with logging and span as far as your imagination takes you. Elastic features like machine learning, security, and reporting compound that value - and since they're made for Elastic, you'll only find them from us. 

Reliably and securely take data from any source, in any format, then search, analyze, and visualize it in real time.

related_products.short_desc: Firewall Analyzer, a log analytics and configuration management software for a complete visibility over entire network security.
related_products.features: Firewall Analyzer is an agent less log analytics and configuration management software, which analyzes logs from firewalls and generates real time alert notifications, security and bandwidth reports. The solution is a vendor-agnostic software and supports more than 50 plus firewall vendors. It also empowers administrators by providing comprehensive reports about the security events and in turn they can take steps to mitigate the security.

similar_products.short_desc: SolarWinds? Papertrail is a cloud-hosted log management tool built for faster troubleshooting of infrastructure & application issues.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds Papertrail is a cloud-hosted log management tool designed for faster troubleshooting of infrastructure and application issues. Papertrail lets you consolidate your logs across your environment in one place and track real-time activity to easily diagnose and fix problems. Features such as log aggregation, tail and search, and proactive alert notifications make Papertrail a frustration-free service providing full and instant visibility across all logs. Try it now-no strings attached.

similar_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
similar_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Log360 is a log management solution that mitigates threats and secures on-premises, cloud, and hybrid environments.
similar_products.features:
Log360 is a log management solution for on premises, cloud and hybrid environments. Its real-time log collection, analysis, correlation, and archival abilities help protect confidential data, mitigate security threats and comply with regulatory mandates.

It offers real-time log collection, analysis, correlation, and archiving abilities. You can monitor activities that occur in your Active Directory, network devices, employee workstations, file servers, Microsoft 365, cloud services and more.

similar_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
similar_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

similar_products.short_desc: Observe is a SaaS Observability offering that enables Engineering and DevOps teams to troubleshoot modern distributed applications 10x
similar_products.features:
Observe is a SaaS Observability offering that enables Engineering and DevOps teams to troubleshoot modern distributed applications 10x faster. Observe consolidates
machine-generated data emitted by applications and turns it into things that are understandable by humans. Instead of searching for breadcrumbs amongst billions of
events, engineers can now ask questions about familiar resources such as customers, containers, builds, tickets, and anything else.

similar_products.short_desc: EventLog Analyzer, a log management tool, collects and analyzes logs to help organizations meet cybersecurity and IT compliance needs.
similar_products.features: As an extensive log management solution, EventLog Analyzer collects and analyzes log data from all devices including Windows and Linux/Unix workstations, servers, network devices, applications, and firewalls across your network. You can gain actionable insights into security events, spot suspicious activities with auditing reports, combat threats with advanced threat intelligence and event correlation, meet compliance audits with predefined audit-ready report.

similar_products.short_desc: Windows Event Log, Syslog, Application Log and Azure Audit Log Management and Compliance Software for IT Professionals.
similar_products.features: Event Log Manager is an On-Premise log management software tool designed to help IT professionals monitor, save and analyze log files from a central location.  Save log file entries to SQL Server, MySQL, Elasticsearch, CosmosDB and Corner Bowl's own file format. Backup raw Windows EVTX files and Linux Audit Logs to a central file server.  Generate reports to fulfill PCI/DSS, JSIG, NIST, HIPAA, SOX, GDPR and others. Monitor Windows Account Lockouts in real-time. All for less!

similar_products.short_desc: Keep tabs on user activity and configurations in your on-premises and cloud-based IT systems.

Netwrix Auditor is a visibility platform that enables control over changes and access in hybrid IT environments and eliminates the stress of your next compliance audit.

See who's changing what and what's causing downtime and troubleshoot issues faster by drilling down on data for root cause analysis.

similar_products.short_desc: Log management software for businesses that includes alerts, reports, and search.
similar_products.features:
Business LOG is a web-based log management software which provides flexible log storage, searching/filtering, analysis, and reporting for businesses. The solution supports cloud-hosted, server installed, and hybrid deployments, and enables server-level acquisition without requiring external agents on monitored machines.

Business LOG centralizes the collection of syslogs and acquisition of network logs, and offers automated detection of servers and computers.

similar_products.features: Collect, view and centralize all your logs in a single point. There are very powerful tools to collect and analyze logs, although installing agents or configuring the forwarding of such logs are tedious tasks. Pandora FMS can handle up to terabytes of raw data. The last thing you would want is to fail an audit, have to disclose a possible data breach because you failed to collect the necessary data for an investigation or not having the data you need to figure out what happened.

similar_products.short_desc: Platform for running fast, secure, and scalable continuous integration pipelines.
similar_products.features: Buildkite is secure and scalable continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) platform that supports over 1000 customers and lets engineers run fast, secure and scalable pipelines on their own infrastructure.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Monitoring software assesses and evaluates computer systems and networks in order to maximize availability of system resources. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Organizations use the diagnostic tools provided by Network Monitoring software to identify problem areas and make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. Network Monitoring software is related to Application Performance Management software, Network Security software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Server Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Server Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Server Management software provides monitoring and performance of managed servers. Administrators can isolate server problems, view all server components, and automate monitoring and reporting of server activity. Many server managers cover multiple devices and can provide alerts or auto corrections for network failures. Server Management software is related to Requirements Management software, Patch Management software, and Website Monitoring software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Website Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Website Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Website Monitoring software provides monitoring and performance alerts of websites and web-based applications. Companies can easily monitor uptime, web performance and transaction performance as well as quickly determine the location of performance failures. Website monitoring solutions are used in nearly every industry, and most provide real time performance alerts on failures involving HTTP, DNS, TCP and transaction response time. Website Monitoring software is related to Requirements Management software, and Patch Management software.

pricing_plans.description: Pro centralizes your monitoring systems, services, and severless functions.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise (Infrastructure)
pricing_plans.description: Enterprise offers advanced features and administrative controls.

pricing_plans.name: Database Monitoring
pricing_plans.description: The Database monitoring plan tracks normalized query performance using database-generated metrics, provides database hosts, insights, clusters and applications.

pricing_plans.name: Incident Management
pricing_plans.description: Incident Management plan includes an fully integraded incident management app with ability to identify and track incidents, as well as collaboration for triage in-app using communication tools.

pricing_plans.name: Cloud SIEM
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for detection and investigation of security threats in rea-time across all ingested data, with custom detection rules, security signal and analytics.
